patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,33 +1,5 @@
-// Import all Angular Material theming functions
-@use '@angular/material' as mat;
 
-// Include core styles - this must come after the @use statement
-@include mat.core();
-
-// Define a primary palette using indigo
-$primary-palette: mat.define-palette(mat.$indigo-palette);
-
-// Define an accent palette using pink
-$accent-palette: mat.define-palette(mat.$pink-palette, A200, A100, A400);
-
-// Define a warn palette using red
-$warn-palette: mat.define-palette(mat.$red-palette);
-
-// Create the theme object
-$theme: mat.define-light-theme((
-  color: (
-    primary: $primary-palette,
-    accent: $accent-palette,
-    warn: $warn-palette,
-  ),
-  typography: mat.define-typography-config(),
-  density: 0,
-));
-
-// Apply the theme to all components
-@include mat.all-component-themes($theme);
-
 ::ng-deep .cdk-overlay-container {
     position: fixed !important;
     top: 0;
     left: 0;
